description.en: Meet Kobato Hanato, a sweet and rather simple young girl on a quest to have her single, dearest wish granted. But first, she must learn the ways of the world from Ioryogi-san, a gruff blue dog whose bark is just as bad as his bite! Under his tutelage (read: constant verbal abuse), Kobato puts her efforts into passing various trials of common sense so that she may obtain the key to getting her wish a magic bottle which must be filled with the suffering of wounded hearts that Kobato herself has healed. But with Kobato's common sense sorely lacking, she keeps flunking Ioryogi-san's trials left and right! It looks like the road that lies ahead of Kobato will be a long one indeed!

biography.en:
CLAMP is a four-woman manga studio formed from the remaining members of the CLAMP doujinshi circle.

- [Ohkawa Ageha](https://mangadex.org/author/937ca459-3e37-450f-9114-ef81a37e335f/ohkawa-ageha) (leader; story & script)
- [Apapa Mokona](https://mangadex.org/author/259db6b3-3c79-4bbc-82f4-b65dde73e904/apapa-mokona) (lead artist; colorist)
- [Nekoi Tsubaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3dffe29e-f96d-446b-a288-84120d4f1297/nekoi-tsubaki) (art assistant; chibi artist)
- Igarashi Satsuki (design; art assistant)

Former Members:
O-Kyon
Nanao Sei
[Akiyama Tamayo](https://mangadex.org/author/e945c2df-7420-42e3-a106-e05b8475aeee/akiyama-tamayo)
[Sei Leeza](https://mangadex.org/author/9dd0940d-4a6d-4f6e-80bf-6884c0b8a64c/sei-leeza)
Hishika Soushi
Nakamori Kazue
Oumi Shinya
